name: network-control
description: Server app for controlling network devices
author: Rados≈Çaw Drab

scripts.start: dotenvx run -f .env.dev -- concurrently --names="SERVER,WATCH" -c "auto" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:app"
scripts.start2: dotenvx run -f .env.dev -- concurrently --names="SERVER,WATCH" -c "auto" "npm run start:server" "npm run build:app"
scripts.prebuild: shx rm -rf dist/ && npm run type-check
scripts.build: dotenvx run -f .env.prod -- node esbuild.mjs && npm run build:app
scripts.postbuild: npm run build-exe && shx rm sea-prep.blob
scripts.build-exe: node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'dist/index.exe')" && postject dist/index.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
